mapper.select: SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO, P.PRODUCT_TITLE, M.MEM_ID, M.MEM_NICKNAME, PD.PRODUCT_PURPOSE, NVL(AVG(R.REVIEW_STAR), 0) AS AVG_STAR, MIN_DO.MIN_PRICE, NVL(JB.IS_LIKED, 0) AS IS_LIKED FROM PRODUCT P JOIN MEMBER M ON P.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID JOIN PRODUCT_DETAIL PD ON P.PRODUCT_NO = PD.PRODUCT_NO LEFT JOIN REVIEW R ON P.PRODUCT_NO = R.PRODUCT_NO JOIN ( SELECT PO.PRODUCT_NO, MIN(DO.DETAIL_OPTION_PRICE) MIN_PRICE FROM PAY_OPTION PO JOIN DETAIL_OPTION DO ON PO.PAY_OPTION_NO = DO.PAY_OPTION_NO GROUP BY PO.PRODUCT_NO ) MIN_DO ON P.PRODUCT_NO = MIN_DO.PRODUCT_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT J.PRODUCT_NO, 1 AS IS_LIKED FROM JJIM J WHERE J.MEM_ID = #{loginUserId} ) JB ON P.PRODUCT_NO = JB.PRODUCT_NO GROUP BY P.PRODUCT_NO, P.PRODUCT_TITLE, M.MEM_ID, M.MEM_NICKNAME, PD.PRODUCT_PURPOSE, MIN_DO.MIN_PRICE, JB.IS_LIKED ORDER BY P.PRODUCT_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JJIM ( MEM_ID, PRODUCT_NO, JJIM_DATE ) VALUES ( #{loginId}, #{productNo}, DEFAULT )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM JJIM WHERE MEM_ID = #{loginId} AND PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT P.PRODUCT_CATEGORY, P.PRODUCT_NO, P.MEM_ID, P.PRODUCT_TITLE, P.PRODUCT_CONTENT, PD.PRODUCT_PURPOSE, PD.DETAIL_TYPE, PD.DETAIL_SIZE, PD.DETAIL_PIXEL, PD.UPDATE_COUNT, PD.DETAIL_WORKDATE, ART.ARTIST_INTRO, ROUND(NVL(AVG(R.REVIEW_STAR),0), 1) AS AVG_STAR, NVL(JB.IS_LIKED, 0) AS IS_LIKED, PDO.PAY_OPTION_NO, PDO.OPTION_NAME, PDO.DETAIL_OPTION_NO, PDO.DETAIL_OPTION_NAME, PDO.DETAIL_OPTION_PRICE FROM PRODUCT P JOIN PRODUCT_DETAIL PD ON P.PRODUCT_NO = PD.PRODUCT_NO JOIN ( SELECT A.ARTIST_INTRO, M.MEM_ID FROM ARTIST A JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEM_ID = A.MEM_ID ) ART ON P.MEM_ID = ART.MEM_ID LEFT JOIN REVIEW R ON P.PRODUCT_NO = R.PRODUCT_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT J.PRODUCT_NO, 1 AS IS_LIKED FROM JJIM J WHERE J.MEM_ID = #{loginId} ) JB ON P.PRODUCT_NO = JB.PRODUCT_NO JOIN ( SELECT DO.DETAIL_OPTION_NO, DO.DETAIL_OPTION_NAME, DO.DETAIL_OPTION_PRICE, PO.PRODUCT_NO, PO.PAY_OPTION_NO, PO.OPTION_NAME FROM DETAIL_OPTION DO JOIN PAY_OPTION PO ON PO.PAY_OPTION_NO = DO.PAY_OPTION_NO ORDER BY DO.DETAIL_OPTION_NO DESC ) PDO ON P.PRODUCT_NO = PDO.PRODUCT_NO WHERE P.PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo} GROUP BY P.PRODUCT_CATEGORY, P.PRODUCT_NO, P.MEM_ID, P.PRODUCT_TITLE, P.PRODUCT_CONTENT, PD.PRODUCT_PURPOSE, PD.DETAIL_TYPE, PD.DETAIL_SIZE, PD.DETAIL_PIXEL, PD.UPDATE_COUNT, PD.DETAIL_WORKDATE, ART.ARTIST_INTRO, JB.IS_LIKED, PDO.PAY_OPTION_NO, PDO.OPTION_NAME, PDO.DETAIL_OPTION_NO, PDO.DETAIL_OPTION_NAME, PDO.DETAIL_OPTION_PRICE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT ( PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_CATEGORY, PRODUCT_TITLE, PRODUCT_CONTENT, PRODUCT_DATE ) VALUES ( PRODUCT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{productCategory}, #{productTitle}, #{productContent}, DEFAULT )

INSERT INTO PRODUCT_DETAIL ( PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_PURPOSE, DETAIL_TYPE, DETAIL_PIXEL, UPDATE_COUNT, DETAIL_WORKDATE ) VALUES ( PRODUCT_SEQ.CURRVAL, #{productPurpose}, #{datailType}, #{detailPixel}, #{updateCount}, #{detailWorkdate} )

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TAG ( TAG_NO, TAG_NAME ) VALUES ( TAG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{tagName} )
INSERT INTO TAG_CHECK ( TAG_CHECK_NO, PRODUCT_NO, TAG_NO ) VALUES ( TAG_CHECK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, PRODUCT_SEQ.CURRVAL, #{tagNo} )

insert.foreach: INSERT INTO PAY_OPTION ( PAY_OPTION_NO, OPTION_NAME, PRODUCT_NO ) VALUES ( PAY_OPTION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{optionNameItem}, PRODUCT_SEQ.CURRVAL )
INSERT INTO DETAIL_OPTION ( DETAIL_OPTION_NO, DETAIL_OPTION_NAME, DETAIL_OPTION_PRICE, PAY_OPTION_NO ) VALUES ( DETAIL_OPTION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{detailOptionNameItem} #{} )
